attributes.action: EU Referendum result should STAND without the need for a 2nd Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The British people have spoken loud and clear. The likelihood is a RE-REFERENDUM would yield the same result and this time the Brexit GAP could be bigger. In the same sense - Project Fear created its own downfall.
attributes.background:
BREXIT was won fair-and-square & every electorate had the chance to vote. Being complacent about REMAIN is not a justified reason to discredit those that voted for BREXIT.

A second referendum completely defies Democracy and makes a mockery of those who chose to vote BREXIT.
